meanings.definition: Wary and unwilling to take risks
meanings.sent1: She was circumspect when crossing the busy street.
meanings.sent2: The circumspect driver always obeyed the speed limit.
meanings.sent3: The circumspect squirrel double-checked before crossing the road.
meanings.sent4: His circumspect nature saved him from many dangerous situations.
meanings.sent5: Being circumspect in the forest helped her avoid stepping on a snake.

meanings.definition: Careful to consider all possible consequences before acting
meanings.sent1: The circumspect student always double-checked his answers.
meanings.sent2: She made a circumspect decision after weighing all options.
meanings.sent3: The circumspect chef tasted the dish before serving it to guests.
meanings.sent4: His circumspect approach to investments paid off in the long run.
meanings.sent5: Being circumspect in her words prevented any misunderstandings.
